display_long_description:
⭐ **LET'S GO VIRAL**

Go viral to the death! Viral Descent is a co-op horror game where you record hilariously creepy clips and try to go viral.‎‎‎‎‎‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎  ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎  ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎  ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎ ‎  
[media]

☢️ **DESCENT INTO THE DANGER**

Lead your squad across radiation zones. Face mutated monsters. Most importantly, make every recording count.

[media]

🕷️ **BEWARE OF THE MONSTERS**

Count on your friends to save your life from terrifying monsters — all while capturing the perfect viral video.

[media]

🎥 **VIEW IS THE MOST IMPORTANT**

If death is inevitable, make sure you get it on camera. Otherwise, it’s all for nothing.


[media]
